meanings.definition: A type of Italian sweet bread typically eaten during the Christmas season.
meanings.sent1: During the holidays, my family enjoys sharing panettoni together.
meanings.sent2: The bakery was filled with the delicious aroma of freshly baked panettoni.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook the panettoni for a giant hat at the Christmas party!
meanings.sent4: The panettoni on the table was a festive centerpiece, drawing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust of the panettoni glistened under the warm lights, tempting us all.
